properties.value: {title: { text: 'Monthly average daily temperatures in the UK' },series: [{type: 'line',xKey: 'date',yKey: 'temp'}],axes: [{type: 'time',nice: false,position: 'bottom',tick: { count: agCharts.time.month },label: { format: '%b %Y' }},{type: 'number',position: 'left',label: {formatter: function (params) {return params.value + ' \xB0C';}}}],padding: {top: 20,right: 40,bottom: 20,left: 20},legend: { enabled: false },data: [{date: new Date('01 Jan 2019 00:00:00 GMT'),temp: 4.2},{date: new Date('01 Feb 2019 00:00:00 GMT'),temp: 6.9},{date: new Date('01 Mar 2019 00:00:00 GMT'),temp: 7.9},{date: new Date('01 Apr 2019 00:00:00 GMT'),temp: 9.1},{date: new Date('01 May 2019 00:00:00 GMT'),temp: 11.2}]}
